entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
